name: micro-mart
description: A micro-frontend e-commerce application built with Single-SPA

scripts.install-all: npm run install:root && npm run install:shell && npm run install:header && npm run install:catalog && npm run install:details && npm run install:cart && npm run install:auth && npm run install:utils
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:root-config" "npm run start:shell" "npm run start:header" "npm run start:home-page" "npm run start:product-catalog" "npm run start:product-details" "npm run start:cart" "npm run start:user-auth" "npm run start:shared-utils"

author: Ameer Hamza
